      function loadScript(scriptURL){
        // load script
        var scriptTAG = document.createElement('script');
        scriptTAG.type = 'application/javascript';
        scriptTAG.async = true;
        scriptTAG.src = scriptURL;
        document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0].appendChild(scriptTAG);
      }

      function loadCSS(CSSURL){
        // load css
        var linkTAG = document.createElement('link');
        linkTAG.rel = "stylesheet";
        linkTAG.type = 'text/css';
        linkTAG.href = CSSURL;
        document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0].appendChild(linkTAG);
      }

    function getCookie(name) 
    {
        var dc = document.cookie;
        var prefix = name + "=";
        var begin = dc.indexOf("; " + prefix);
        if (begin == -1) {
            begin = dc.indexOf(prefix);
            if (begin != 0) return null;
        }
        else
        {
            begin += 2;
            var end = document.cookie.indexOf(";", begin);
            if (end == -1) {
                end = dc.length;
            }
        }
        return unescape(dc.substring(begin + prefix.length, end));
    }

<script type="text/javascript">
	// Get options from CMS
	var topiclistTitle = "Dbriefs Calendar";
	if (topiclistTitle.indexOf("topiclist-title") !== -1) {
		topiclistTitle = "Topics";
	}

	var
		topiclistText = [
			"<p>View our Dbriefs calendar</p>",
			"${topiclist-item2-text}",
			"${topiclist-item3-text}",
			"${topiclist-item4-text}",
			"${topiclist-item5-text}",
			"${topiclist-item6-text}",
			"${topiclist-item7-text}",
			"${topiclist-item8-text}",
			"${topiclist-item9-text}"
		],
		topiclistURL = [
			"/content/www/us/en/pages/dbriefs-webcasts/dbriefs-webcast-calendar.html",
			"${topiclist-item2-link}",
			"${topiclist-item3-link}",
			"${topiclist-item4-link}",
			"${topiclist-item5-link}",
			"${topiclist-item6-link}",
			"${topiclist-item7-link}",
			"${topiclist-item8-link}",
			"${topiclist-item9-link}"
		],
		topicListLinkLevel = [
/*
	"primary", "secondary", or "tertiary"
	DEFAULT: tertiary
*/
			"tertiary",
			"${topiclist-item2-link-level}",
			"${topiclist-item3-link-level}",
			"${topiclist-item4-link-level}",
			"${topiclist-item5-link-level}",
			"${topiclist-item6-link-level}",
			"${topiclist-item7-link-level}",
			"${topiclist-item8-link-level}",
			"${topiclist-item9-link-level}"
		],
		topicListActiveState = [
/*
	"yes" or "no"
	DEFAULT: no
*/
			"yes",
			"${topiclist-item2-active}",
			"${topiclist-item3-active}",
			"${topiclist-item4-active}",
			"${topiclist-item5-active}",
			"${topiclist-item6-active}",
			"${topiclist-item7-active}",
			"${topiclist-item8-active}",
			"${topiclist-item9-active}"
		];

	var numberOfTopiclistItems = 1,
	

	renderedTopiclist = "	<nav id=\"fragment-topiclist\" class=\"fragment-topiclist\">\n";
	renderedTopiclist += "		<h4 class=\"fragment-topiclist-header\">" + topiclistTitle + "</h4>\n";
	for (var t = 0; t < numberOfTopiclistItems; t++) {
		renderedTopiclist += "		<a class=\"fragment-topiclist-link";
		// Link level check
		if( topicListLinkLevel[t] && ( topicListLinkLevel[t] === "primary" || topicListLinkLevel[t] === "secondary") ) {
			renderedTopiclist += " " + topicListLinkLevel[t];
		}
		else {
			renderedTopiclist += " tertiary";
		}
		// Active state check
		if( topicListActiveState[t] === "yes" ) {
			renderedTopiclist += " is-active";
		}
		renderedTopiclist += "\" href=\"" + topiclistURL[t] + "\" onclick=\"topicList('" + topiclistText[t] + "', 'click')\">" + topiclistText[t] + "</a>\n";
		if( t === numberOfTopiclistItems-1 ) {
			renderedTopiclist += "	</nav><!-- /fragment-topic-list -->\n";
		}
	};
	// After document is ready, put the nav where it belongs
	$(document).ready(function() {
		$(".col-30.tab-solutions:first").prepend(renderedTopiclist);
	});
</script>
